description: Pumpkin is one of my favourite vegetables & when combined with delicious flavours & baked hasselback style is a knock out dish for any festive or special event.
name: Maple Walnut Hasselback Pumpkin Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp fresh sage leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the skin, seeds & pulp from pumpkin.
Place cut side down onto baking tray that has been lined with baking paper and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and let slightly cool.
While pumpkin is in the oven combine the maple syrup, olive oil, dijon mustard, chopped herbs, salt and pepper in a small bowl and mix well until combined.
When slightly cooled cut slices in the pumpkin using the skewers as a guide so you don't cut the whole way through.
Remove skewers and brush 1/2 of the maple syrup dressing over the pumpkin and into the slits and return to oven for 10 minutes.
Continue basting pumpkin till it is almost cooked then add walnuts to syrup dressing and mix well.

Spoon dressing mixed with walnuts over the top of pumpkin and return to the oven for a few minutes until golden. Do not leave too long or you will burn the walnuts.Serve with fresh herbs and a pinch of salt.
